description: Four deaths are reported in Spain, with Gloria described as the worst storm in the region since 1982.
title: Deadly storm Gloria batters Spain, then shifts to France
title_page: Deadly storm Gloria batters Spain, then shifts to France - BBC News
maintext: One man was killed in a car accident on a snowbound road in the Asturias region, while another man was found dead outside his home in the town of Moixent with signs of hypothermia.
